Body:
I'm trying to send temperature data from arduino to thingspeak through ESP8266, But I don't have code to configure my WiFi. I'm searching for code from last two days, but not working. Please provide me code to connect to my local wifi using SSID and password.

Body:
You need to change:

String ssid = ATL-WL";	String pass = "atl#yd81";

to whatever your ssid and pass are for your WiFi. I would also urge you to change:

String apiKey = "20YMPJA0XII0IEF4";	String ssid = "ATL-WL";	String pass = "atl#yd81";

completely now that you've posted them to the interwebz.

You should also ensure that you get a new API key from thingspeak.com as well.

You'll also want to ensure that CR/LF are being properly processed in your setup() loop. You might be incorrectly assuming bad code when it could be a bad serial connection setup.

"

I don't have this device nor a way to test the results but a simple Google search resulted in the following:

AT+CWJAP="<access_point_name>"
